about_the_game:
Lost Cats


Lost Cats is a 4 vs 1 online horror game,
play with or against your friends and randoms!


The Game:
Every game can have 2-4 Survivors and 1 Monster,
at the start of the game a random map is chosen,
the objective for the survivors is to vanish all the totems and escape,
the objective for the monster is to kill all survivors.
Survivors can drop stacked boxes to stun the killer and
to get distance. Survivors can also crawl through the boxes.
The Monster can break the boxes to get rid of the obstacle.

Perks and Abilities
Every cat have their own ability,
you can combine your cats ability with 1-3 different perks.
Perks can have a level that range from 1 to 3.
You can combine 3 perks of the same rarity for a higher one.
Perks and Cats can be randomly found and get added to your
Steam inventory.
Perk and Cats are marketable and tradeable!

Stats and Achivements
As Survivor, after every game you will get points for...
...doing objectives
...stunning the monster
...healing other survivors
and escaping.

As Monster, after every game you will get points for...
...killing survivors
...breaking boxes
and killing all survivors.

The game will have on launch atleast +10 awesome achivements.
Not too grindy and not too hard!


Please keep in mind, this game is still in development and everything you currently see is subject to change :3

content_descriptors.notes:
The cats can bleed, thats it.
Just a few red pixels.

name: Lost Cats

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Pentium 4 NW 3.4GHz With HT
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 8800 GTS
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Soundcard or integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3210 Dual Core 3.2GHz Or AMD FX-9590 4.7GHz Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Quadro M2000/Nvidia Geforce 950 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SoundCard Or Integrated

short_description: Lost Cats is a 4 vs 1 online horror game, play with or against your friends and randoms! Collect perks and cats to dominate the game! Build your own sets, be creative! Have Fun!
